### 2020 Batting Stats {#batting}
```{r pressure, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
batters <- read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/batters_simple.csv")
#batters <- batters[complete.cases(batters),]
#batters$Age <- as.numeric(batters$Age)
d <- batters %>% filter(Team == "KT Wiz") %>% select(-Team, -KName)
d <- d[order(-d$WAR),]
#d$Name.mykbo <- paste0("[", d$Name.mykbo, "](/players/", d$ID, ")")
#d <- d %>% select(-ID, -Name)
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,0,0,3,1,1,3,3,1,2), col.names = c("Name","Pos","G","PA","HR","OPS","BB%","SO%","ISO","BABIP","wRC+","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>%column_spec(1, bold = T, border_right = F)
```

### 2020 Pitching Stats {#pitching}
```{r, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
pitchers <- read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/pitchers_simple.csv")
```
